name: Silver Legacy Sports Bar
description: The Sports Bar at Silver Legacy Resort Casino puts you at the center of the action with wall-to-wall screens, a full bar, and comfortable seating. Watch every major sporting event while enjoying craft beers, premium cocktails, and bar food favorites. Located on the main casino floor, it's a natural gathering point for golf groups staying at The Row.
shortDescription: Wall-to-wall screens and full bar on the Silver Legacy casino floor.

faqs.question: Where is the Silver Legacy Sports Bar?
faqs.answer: On the main casino floor at Silver Legacy Resort, part of The Row complex in downtown Reno.

faqs.question: What can I watch there?
faqs.answer: All major sporting events on wall-to-wall screens including NFL, NBA, PGA, and more.

faqs.question: Is it walkable from Eldorado and Circus Circus?
faqs.answer: Yes, The Row connects Silver Legacy, Eldorado, and Circus Circus via indoor skywalks.

meta.title: Silver Legacy Sports Bar – Reno Casino Sports | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Catch every game on wall-to-wall screens at Silver Legacy's Sports Bar. The Row's go-to spot for golf groups in Reno.

testimonials.quote: Silver Legacy Sports Bar has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside silver-legacy-resort-casino. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Sarah S.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Silver Legacy Sports Bar. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Michelle E.
